thread.title: Champions League quarterfinal draw results: Barcelona, Real Madrid get tough draws
thread.title_full: Champions League quarterfinal draw results: Barcelona, Real Madrid get tough draws

author: Roger Gonzalez
title: Champions League quarterfinal draw results: Barcelona, Real Madrid get tough draws
text:
1h ago • 1 min read 
The Champions League quarterfinal draw took place early Friday morning as Barcelona, Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid, Bayern Munich, Borussia Dortmund, Juventus, Monaco and Leicester City were drawn into four ties. 
Here are the results. Atl. Madrid vs. Leicester CityBor. Dortmund vs. MonacoBayern Munich vs. Real MadridJuventus vs. Barcelona — CBS Sports Soccer (@CBSSportsSoccer) March 17, 2017 
Wow. With the amount of quality there entering the draw, you just had to know we were going to get some tasty ties. Bayern-Real Madrid and Barcelona-Juventus is absolutely nuts. Arguably the four best teams in Europe, but in quarterfinal ties, and each with a fantastic chance of winning the competition. 
As for other matchups, Atletico wil be a heavy favorite against Leicester, while Dortmund and Monaco is probably pretty even. Right now, it is anyone’s game and these matches will be something else. 
The first legs will be played on April 11-12, while the return legs will be on April 18-19.
